metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1270 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In GraphicsMagick, a heap buffer overflow was found when parsing MIFF.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1270` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.6+esm2
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.6+esm2
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.6+esm2
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.6+esm2
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.6+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.23-1ubuntu0.6+esm2').
